name: Caraplug
0:
”Alexa, turn on the the sprinkler”
”Alexa, turn on the plug”
”Alexa, turn on the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Manage and control multiple types of smart devices, including light switches, irrigation systems, garage doors, curtains, etc., with additional weather control features.
With weather control, automatically turn devices on/off or skip schedules based on precipitation, temperature, wind speed and other factors. Users can set the criteria themselves.
Compatible with Alexa, Google Home, and HomeKit.
